channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, TX1, TX2, Nano and Nano 2GB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, TX1, TX2, Nano and Nano 2GB

item.title: CVE-2021-1070|2024-08-03T15:55:18.538Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20tx1%2C%20tx2%2C%20nano%20and%20nano%202gb
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, TX1, TX2, Nano and Nano 2GB, L4T versions prior to 32.5, contains a vulnerability in the apply_binaries.sh script used to install NVIDIA components into the root file system image, in which improper access control is applied, which may lead to an unprivileged user being able to modify system device tree files, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2021-1071|2024-08-03T15:55:18.488Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20tx1%2C%20tx2%2C%20nano%20and%20nano%202gb
item.description: NVIDIA Tegra kernel in Jetson AGX Xavier Series, Jetson Xavier NX, TX1, TX2, Nano and Nano 2GB, all L4T versions prior to r32.5, contains a vulnerability in the INA3221 driver in which improper access control may lead to unauthorized users gaining access to system power usage data, which may lead to information disclosure.
